content:
I apologize for my mistakes in previous attempts. Here is a revised list of stage visits to obtain all upgrades in the most efficient order:

1. Chill Penguin's stage - Obtain Heart Tank, exit
2. Flame Mammoth's stage - Obtain Body Upgrade, Sub-Tank, exit
3. Spark Mandrill's stage - Obtain Sub-Tank, exit
4. Armored Armadillo's stage - Obtain Heart Tank, exit
5. Launch Octopus' stage - Obtain Homing Torpedo, exit
6. Boomer Kuwanger's stage - Obtain Boomerang Cutter, Heart Tank, exit
7. Sting Chameleon's stage - Obtain Chameleon Sting, Heart Tank, exit
8. Storm Eagle's stage - Obtain Storm Tornado, Heart Tank, exit

Return to each stage to obtain the remaining items:
9. Flame Mammoth's stage (second visit) - Obtain Heart Tank, exit

1. Spark Mandrill's stage (second visit) - Obtain Heart Tank, Sub-Tank, exit
2. Armored Armadillo's stage (second visit) - Obtain Rolling Shield, exit
3. Launch Octopus' stage (second visit) - Obtain Shotgun Ice, Heart Tank, exit
4. Boomer Kuwanger's stage (second visit) - Obtain Boomerang Cutter upgrade, exit
5. Sting Chameleon's stage (third visit) - Obtain Leg Upgrade, exit
6. Storm Eagle's stage (second visit) - Obtain Heart Tank, Sub-Tank, exit

Once all upgrades have been obtained, proceed to Sigma stages in the following order:

1. Vile's stage - Defeat Vile
2. Sigma Stage 1 - Defeat Sigma's first form
3. Sigma Stage 2 - Defeat Sigma's second form
4. Sigma Stage 3 - Defeat Sigma's final form

I hope this updated guide is more accurate and helpful for you.
